survey_data_q05 %>%
  ggplot(
    aes(
      x = `Q10 Response`
      ,colour = Q4
      ,fill = Q4 
    )
  ) +
  geom_bar() +
  facet_wrap(
    ~ Q4
    ,scales = "free_y"
  ) +
  scale_colour_brewer(
    type = "qual"
    ,palette = "Set2"
  ) +
  scale_fill_brewer(
    type = "qual"
    ,palette = "Set2"
  ) +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))
